entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Monitor should limit recursion #85128
  • [Android][Net6/7] TimeZoneInfo StandardName/DaylightName does not displays abbreviations anymore #85126
  • [JitStress] Assertion failed 'genActualType(type) == type' #85121
  • Porting NativeAOT exception handling implementation to CoreCLR #85119
    8.0.0
  • Logging AddSimpleConsole should allow for trimming Json and Systemd formatters #85116
    8.0.0
  • Support Stateless TLS resumption on Mac/Linux #85113
    Future
  • Missing overrides in LoggingHttpMessageHandler and LoggingScopeHttpMessageHandler #85104
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Missing CompositeFormat features #85099
  • ZipFile hangs when encountering named pipe #85097
  • [ppc64le] Source build crashing for mono runtime. #85089
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'block->lastNode()->OperGet() == GT_RETFILT' during 'Generate code' (IL size 1480; hash 0x46e9aa75; FullOpts) #85088
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.NotSupportedException: DelegateMarshalling_MissingInteropData in Marshal.StructureToPtr #85086
  • Unable to load Analyzer assembly .../Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers.dll : Not a valid assembly #85082
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693.dll #85081
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce TimeProvider extension method to create a CTS to be cancelled after a specified time period. #85080
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: CipherMode.CFB does not Encrypt without changing FeedbackSize (DES) #85079

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Generic type in Math #85066
  • XmlSerializer.GenerateSerializer alternate API in .NET Core #84777
    8.0.0
  • JsonConsoleFormatter: (escaped) line breaks of exception stacktraces should be kept #83726
    Future
  • String.Compare Always ignore case #85094
  • [JitStress] JIT/IL_Conformance/Old/Conformance_Base/bge_un* failures #84966
    8.0.0
  • Linux x64 Runtime - Access Denied #85118
  • NullReferenceException in async code between System.Security.Cryptography HashProviderCng.AppendHashData and BCrypt.BCryptHashData(...) #85115
  • Is There a Plan to Support TLS Session Resumption Without Server-Side State RFC 5077 #84136
  • [wasm] SimpleSourceChangeRebuildTest.SimpleStringChangeInSource - Long running test error, cannot access file used by another process #83752
    8.0.0
  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Text.Json.Tests.WorkItemExecution timing out #84434
    8.0.0
  • QUIC failures on linux #82771
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'tree->gtVNPair.BothDefined() || tree->OperIs(GT_PHI_ARG)' during 'Do value numbering' #81688
    8.0.0
  • Obsolete some protected members of Regex{Runner} #62573
    8.0.0
  • ContentDisposition.ToString() will generate \r\n when FileName use long chinese string #85091
  • TypeLoadException in WASM with Covariance #78635
    8.0.0
  • JsonConfigurationFileParser.cs RootElement not support Array #83373
  • [API Proposal]: Add GetElapsedTime(long) #84945
    8.0.0
  • arm64 JitStressRegs8 VectorTableLookup test failures #84746
    8.0.0
  • [JitStress] VectorTableLookupExtension fails in jitstress1 #84696
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'refPosition->RegOptional()' #84747
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime|exception-count metric shows different values after migration from netcore3.1 to net6 #83690
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding TimeProvider CreateCancellationTokenSource extension method #85131
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Keep instrumentings some intrinsics #85130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding Shuffle(). #85129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fold IND(frozenObj, CNS) #85127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Detect constant-size cpblk copies in the jiterpreter and unroll them #85125
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Unsubscribe from codegen-coreclr notifications #85124
    area-Meta
  • Block Runtime_84693 with the issue #85081 #85123
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use `genActualType` in `LowerSwitch` #85122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add public Encoding.TryGetBytes/Chars #85120
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome #85114
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Support non core types for signature and other type references #85112
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Ensure ins_Copy, ins_Load, ins_Move, and ins_Store all handle TYP_MASK #85110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [browser] Enable threads in Wasm SDK #85109
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [MONO] Add JIT_CODE_DEBUG_INFO record functionality for Jitdump #85107
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Add parsing error information to composite format string parsing exceptions #85106
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Support some assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a test for `STORE_DYN_BLK(..., IND(null), ...)` #85103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • DateTimeParse: accept all white space chars in the format string for DateTimeStyles Allow White #85102
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo14::EnumerateNonGCObjects #85100
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` update string decoding for comparison #85098
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` checking for prefix/suffix #85093
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • NativeAOT ComWrappers: extend managed object lifetime based on refcount #85087
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] fix the arg regs' loop depending. #85085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

Merged

  • JsonConsoleFormatter: keep escaped line breaks for Exceptions #83726 #84972
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Simplify `impSIMDPopStack` and delete a quirk from `gtNewLoadValueNode` #85070
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Acclerate `Vector512` multiply and divide. #84941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [JIT] ARM64 Fix - Use `SetOper` instead of `ChangeOper` to preserve flags #85076
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable failing AOT tests to get CI green again #85111
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix dumping of block op kinds #85101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Accelerate Vector512 `ConvertToSingle` and `ConvertToInt32`. #84932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Do not surface resolver exceptions when running ancestor type resolution #85108
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Remove missed iOSMobileNet6 runtimeType check #85075
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] add internal WebWorkerEventLoop utility class #84492
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [browser] bump System.Text.Json timeout #85041
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] amend the gcinfo. #85092
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.GetElement as intrinsic in arm64. #84929
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Obsolete some protected, unused members of Regex{Runner} #84812
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reduce regex test suite time #84865
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Improve docs for the linker analyzer tool #84833
    documentation, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [LoongArch64] revert the modification about the LA64's PageSize by #83632. #84960
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #85090
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][metadata] Fix lookup of matching interface method with covariant returns #84160
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement function pointer type support #85031
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm]bump emsdk manually #85084
    area-Build-mono
  • Add TimeProvider.GetElapsedTime(long) overload #85078
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Add a dedicated Ascii.IsValid path #84881
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Various fixes for consecutive registers found with jitstressregs #84824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [PERF] Remove pipeline dependencies and steps for running Maui Mobile #85074
    area-Infrastructure
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Improve allocations in ReflectionXmlSerializationWriter when serializing primitive types #84474
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Report -1 for GC.GetGeneration(nongc_obj) and same for GetObjectGeneration #85017
    breaking-change, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Avx512: Abs, ceil, floor, min, max #84937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Lowering Vector512() methods : comparison + shift #84942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Fix type initialization ordering under R2R #84275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use `gtNewIndir` everywhere #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #84604
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not has default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Avoid null ref in JsonSeparatorNamingPolicy #85002
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add NativeAOT runtime pack build for iOS/tvOS/Catalyst #85047
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [browser] Enable webcil in Wasm SDK #84977
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • add nixos ping executable path #84997
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Handle not compatible parameters to IndexOf #84692
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine 'neg' and 'cmp' to 'cmn' #84667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add TargetHostName to QuicConnection #84976
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix enterprise linux build #84795
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WBT: Re-enable previously disabled test #85009
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging][wasm][debugger] Remove error message when browser is closed #85062
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.18
  • [wasm-mt] A version of LowLevelLifoSemaphore that uses callbacks on the browser #84491
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #82146
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Arm64] Replace pairs of `str` with `stp` #85032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Port perfmap environment variable change to 7.0 #85072
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.7
  • [mono][debugger] Improving debugger functionaties #85050
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable event pipe test in NativeAOT CI run #84891
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add TextWriter.FlushAsync(CancellationToken) #84325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Vectorize IEnumerable<T>.Sum where possible #84519
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] implement ICU bundling #85049
    area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Almost complete sync of logic for generating DAM/RUC reflection access warnings between ILLink and NativeAOT #84770
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • In Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator targets, respect Optimize property. #82374
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Jettison vxsort support in the GC when optimizing for size #85036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add documentation for merge on red, build analysis, and v1/v2 tests #84982
    documentation, area-Infrastructure, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Build on mariner with llvm 16 #84676
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Restructure WellKnownOids.cs #84921
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, size-reduction
  • Use emit-based invoke for all of WASM including DI #85065
    arch-wasm, area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, os-android, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: export for NativeAOT_StaticInitialization automatically #2259

Closed

  • Memory access out of bounds when running the Web Assembly native library sample #2258
  • Linux x64 Runtime - Access Denied #2260

PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to apr 15 #2255

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Better support for non-standard `$(Configuration)` names #31918

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix outer build artifacts output path #31919
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Invoke MakeDir task before invoking Touch task #31906
    untriaged

Merged

  • Copied some out of sync loc files into main #31871
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Default JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault to true on Blazor WASM. #31909
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add `-aot` parameter to the console template #31739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Signing: enable NuGet signature verification by default on Linux #31868
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Add "Inline array type syntax" section to inline-arrays.md #7130

Updated

  • Add more details to extensions spec #7038

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nested struct array throws TypeLoadException at runtime when type of nested struct array is defined with generics #67900
  • Debug assertion fails in MergedNamespaceSymbol #67898
  • Two source-build prebuilts #67894
  • Clarify errors around void expressions in switch expressions / Disallow them in switch exp. instead of propagating void #67889
    Backlog
  • Move the SyntaxTree and SemanticModel action based analyzers to respect context.FilterSpan #67888
    17.7
  • `IParameterSymbol.GetDocumentationCommentXml` for primary constructor parameters always return `string.Empty` #67886
    17.7

Closed

  • VB incorrectly allows access to a protected constructor from a shared member of a derived class #67130
    17.7
  • CS8602 Nullable warning is missing #66921
    17.7
  • Enums & generic math #66542
  • Ease understandability of incremental generators #67745
  • `IGeneratorContext.AddSource` throws ArgumentException wrongly claiming invalid filename on linux #67653
  • Source Generator is not reloaded since SDK 7.0.200 - .NET Host cache issue? #67388
    17.7
  • VB For Each issue #67134
    17.7
  • Switch statement error recovery improvements #67757
    17.7
  • Race condition bug in Formatter when requesting formatted changes for a sub-span in a file #67887

PullRequests

Created

  • Give more accurate information when we get an out of bounds error in LSP #67906
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.4 release branch #67903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.2 release branch #67902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.0 release branch #67901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add additional information to an argument exception #67899
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Refactoring CompletionHandler #67897
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make EnC service a MEF service instead of a workspace service #67896
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Use correct ref-pack versions #67895
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect oversimplification of 'default(T)' arguments #67893
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flatten merged namespaces #67891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use SymbolLocations.FirstOrDefault instead of TryGetFirstLocation #67890
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Filter out configure & suppress code fixers when it is not in VS LSP #67885
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Pool intermediary dictionaries use to create named type and namespace members #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Better recover from missing closing `}` or `]` in switch statements #67862
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Do not NGEN our build task #67892
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Additional places where locations can be avoided #67844
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 #67875
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Seal WrappedParameterSymbol.HasUnscopedRefAttribute #67879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move tests down from editor features to features layer. #67883
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge ITextAndVersion and ITextVersionable #67847
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool node collections in analyzer driver. #67776
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Do not return file-local type requested by unmangled metadata name #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Interceptors: handle duplicates, additional signature validation, etc. #67786
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Update code lens cache to use the syntax version #67884
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include diagnostic help URL in output #67836
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use non-void type for `BoundAwaitOperator` in VB statement #67822
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Implement element access for inline array types #67830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add FilterSpan API to analyzer contexts #67818
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor has HttpClient issues on small screens #47815
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #47810
  • Basic IFormFile model validation attributes #47809
  • Enable static graph restore in build #47808
  • QuickGrid: Sample showing how to change color of sorting indicator does not work #47805
  • [Blazor] Form events follow ups #47804
    8.0-preview5
  • Incorrect CSS import created when hosting multiple WASM apps not at root #47803
  • `dotnet watch` ignores `StaticWebAssetBasePath` for third-party library #47802
  • embedded linux-arm dotnet 6/7 segmentation fault #47801

Closed

  • Generate form field identifiers for Blazor server-side rendering #47780
  • Different logging behaviour between net 6 and 7 for Request Body in HttpLoggingMiddleware #47216
    8.0-preview4
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #47727
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #47785
  • Perf regression: https #47786
  • Update the Worker template to use the `Host.CreateApplicationBuilder` API. #43113
    8.0-preview4
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Open Id Connect cookies are being block by Gateway WAF #47583

PullRequests

Created

  • Add RequiresUnreferencedCode attribute to AddMvc calls. #47816
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor] Add support for accessing the request body form parameters #47814
    area-blazor
  • Test restore static graph #47813
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fix RequestBody logging when zero byte read is used #47811
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate RequestBody for parameters when disabledInferredBody is true #47807
    Servicing-consider, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 7.0.x
  • Write log message for matched fallback routes #47798
    area-runtime
  • Add default configuration and logging to CreateSlimBuilder #47797
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Log if a server certificate lacks the subjectAlternativeName extensions #47678
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • UseBlazorFrameworkFiles: add webcil mime type mapping #46244
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Exclude more problematic assemblies from the ASP.NET composite #47812
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Blazor form model expression formatting #47754
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Fix RequestBody logging when zero byte read is used #47794
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, 8.0-preview4
  • [blazor] Boot handled by dotnet.js #47752
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4
  • Update ReadMe.SharedCode.md to mention runtime-sync.yml #47722
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Update the Worker template to use `Host.CreateApplicationBuilder` #47720
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview4
  • Sync shared code from runtime #47793
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • [Blazor] Adds support for server side rendered forms (without a body) #47716
    area-blazor
  • Add metrics to rate limiting #47758
    area-runtime
  • Add MapIdentity<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • RDG metadata generation based on endpoint response type. #47741
    area-runtime
  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, blog-candidate, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #47731
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2163359 #47784
    area-mvc
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Fix F# starter web template. #47697
    area-mvc
  • Replace lock with CAS #47751
    area-runtime
  • Update servicing milestones for June #47765
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Fix null property name handling logic in SystemTextJsonValidationMetadataProvider #47775
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf
  • Update MessagePack version #47790
    area-signalr
  • Fix nullref when getting struct from feature collection and it isn't present #47795
    area-runtime
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update LoginDisplay.IndividualB2CAuth.razor #47654

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Finish CI Automation for WinUI Device Tests #14696

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Automatically set modified date on each SaveChanges #30737
  • Internal EF Exception Not Visible in Controller Resulting in Ambiguous 500 Return #30736
  • Wrong SQL generation of JOIN columns when using OwnsOne mapping with separate table #30735
  • Support non-constants in inline collections (VALUES) #30734
  • Table with same name as a materialized view gives error #30733
  • Consider not client-evaluating NewArrayExpression in parameter extractor #30732

Closed

  • I get different results when registering the concurrency update: one throws an exception, the other doesn't #30720
  • Allow 'unsharing' connection between contexts #30704
    8.0.0-preview4
  • `Remove` together with `SaveChangesAsync` didn't delete entities. #30723
  • SetCommandTimeout seems like it is not working #30688

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow DI for pooled DbContexts #30739
  • Support primitive collections #30738

Merged

  • Allow changing an open connection if it's not owned #30706
    community-contribution
